Title: Illusion Evening Dress

----

Sku: JC4102

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 14, 8, 4, 12, 10, 6

----

Colors: lavender

Category: formal-gowns

----

Featured-image: JC4102-lavender-illusion-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: This modern design take the original cocktail dress and turns it on its heels. It is a sleeveless look with a beaded bodice and sheer waist meeting the above the knee. The skirt is covered in the same light catching beading completed with a sheer overlay that reaches the ankles. Modern and fun.
